name: 2024 7th International Conference on Electronics Technology
content: Conference Proceedings: All the accepted regular full papers will be included in IEEE Conference Proceedings. Additionally, regular papers presented at the conference will be also submitted to Digital Library, and then indexed by EI Compendex & SCOPUS, etc. SCI/Scopus Journals: Selected papers will be recommended to the following SCI/Scopus journals after extension (submit for SCI, EI Compendex, Scopus)ï¼Œplease kindly indicate your preference when you submit, know more, feel free to contact us. International Journal of Electrical Power & Energy Systems (ISSN: 0142-0615) Impact Factor: 5.659 Discover Nano (ISSN: 2731-9229) Impact Factor: 5.418 Computers & Electrical Engineering (ISSN: 0045-7906) Impact Factor: 4.152 Micromachines (ISSN: 2072-666X) Impact Factor: 3.523 Journal of Electronic Science and Technology (ISSN: 1674-862X) Citescore Track: 2.7
organizers: Sichuan Institute of Electronics and IEEE
